body:
yo, if anyone still remembers Speeded, dereban, miunaa, and even izutsushi, (or toby no.2 for some people)
im back, and summer vacation has started for me since 2 weeks ago so i kinda wanted to do something besides
my other plans so i'll be streaming avicus every now and then, for now ill be testing out my stream and as well
answering an AMA either here on the site (by looking on the forums via my phone) or maybe live on stream so yeah

come hang out for a bit if you fancy it https://www.twitch.tv/ichiban_desu

replies.body:
how can it be summer vacation if it's spring
i mean even in australia it's like fall or something
replies.body_tagged:
how can it be summer vacation if it's spring
i mean even in australia it's like fall or something

replies.body: not in our country haha, we dont have spring, we only have hot (summer) and wet (rainy) seasons
replies.body_tagged: not in our country haha, we dont have spring, we only have hot (summer) and wet (rainy) seasons

replies.body: Welcome back jiff! Good to see you :)
